title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 §§ 8186-2.5 - Computation of full value of taxable real property
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 §§ 8186-2.5 - Computation of full value of taxable real property

State Regulations
(a) When computing a tentative equalization
rate or ratio pursuant to section
8186-2.4
of this Subpart, the full value of the taxable real property shall be computed
according to the full value standard that applies to the current roll as set
forth in the procedures for the rates or ratios for the appropriate assessment
roll year. (b) The value of the
taxable real property as of the valuation date of a market value survey shall
be computed in the manner provided by section
8186-2.6
of this Subpart. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
§§
8186-2.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
